name: 101 Doors
description:
Warning: Super addictive gameplay! Don't play at work :)

101 Doors, guarded by 101 Locks!

Tap at the right moment to pick the locks and unlock the doors, and be the fastest to do so!

There are 101 locks waiting for you to be picked, and an Endless mode to practice on, or crush other players high scores!

Use the coins you get to upgrade your tools and unlock the doors even faster.
